Summary: Rotating, flashing lights on round or pentagonal f
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband (witness2) drove home from an outdoor meeting @7:30 PM. He called meon his cellphone, said me and Teresa and her husband are lokking at a UFO in theNW. Look out the window and see if you can see it. I saw it out the bathroomwindow, and it looked like a bright flashing star or planet. He got hope @ 10minutes later and we looked with binoculars, but they gave a blurred view. Wealso saw another one near it. They just hovered very far in the diastant sky,and @ 8:45 seemed to slowly move further away and disappear. The next night onereappeared in the same place @ 7:30PM and through a Mead telescope we saw thatit changed from all red lights to all green lights to all white lights. Theyseemed to be rotating. You couldnt see a structure just the rotating lights. Itappeared oval or round seen from an angle that made it appear round. My husbandthought it appeared octagonal or pentagonal. On 10-19-01 we observed it again atabout the same time frame.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Suwanee
There were no other sightings in Suwanee on or around October 16th 2001
